CSimple

A simple way to make websites look good.

This is CSimple, The simple CSS framework for your website. This framework will handle a lot of basic features for your website and should give you a working design with the minimal amount of set up. This also optionally includes a few JavaScript - based conveniences.

You can click on this button to download the framework.

CLICK HERE to download

Browser Compatibility

The framework uses CSS3 and HTML5, so it should be usable on most web browsers.

Requirements

This framework assumes you are using a modern browser that supports CSS version 3. You also need some way to compile Sass files, as the framework was written in Sass.

Some of the features require JavaScript and jQuery and they will be indicated.

So, what's next?

The rest of the pages here describe how to use the framework, and the classes you can add to them.

  • Installation - How to install the framework and customize settings.

  • Page Settings - General web page settings and how to change them.

  • Responsive - See how Browser Width affects parts of your web page.

  • HTML Elements - Options to change various HTML elements.

  • Visibiity - Control the visibility of elements.

  • JavaScript - These features require JavaScript and jQuery.

  • Examples - Sample websites that show off CSimple's many features.
